title: Interpretation of a dream about feathers according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about feathers in a dream about sticks has many interpretations that we would like to know and are confused about their meaning, as the flight of wings varies from house to house or wings in the sky or on the ground and other dreams. In this article, we will study for you all the interpretations of this dream. Read also: A feast in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about feathers in a dream for Al-Asimi. Status. This dream symbolizes fatigue and illness, and God knows best. To see yourself flying without wings is evidence of increasing goodness, standing up, and changing circumstances for the better, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. As for seeing feathers falling, this is a sign of distress and worry, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Read also: Seeing pins in Dream Interpretation of a dream about feathers for a single woman in Al-Osaimi’s dream When you see wings in a dream for a single woman, this has many clues, which we will examine for you through the following: Seeing a girl flying with wings is a sign of sound thinking and decision-making as well as self-reliance and responsibility. As for seeing a girl flying with wings, This dream is for a single woman and she is flying in the sky, this is a sign of overcoming difficulties, overcoming obstacles, and also attaining freedom, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. But when you see the white wings of an unmarried girl in a dream, this is evidence of joy, happiness, success, and courtship, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Read also: Holding the hand of a friend In a dream, the interpretation of seeing a man’s wings in a dream by Al-Asimi. Seeing a man’s wings in a dream has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: When you see a man flying from one place to another, this is a sign of marriage to another woman, separation, or problems at home, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. As for seeing a man flying With wings, this is a sign of a change in the situation for the better or success in practical life, and God knows best. But when you see a man flying in the sky, this is a sign of profit, legitimate living, an increase in money, and the satisfaction of the dreamer’s desires, and God knows best. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing one’s wife’s wings in a dream by Al-Osaimi. When you see wings Your wife in a dream has many signs, including: Seeing a woman with wings and thick feathers is a sign of an abundance of money and an increase in goodness and happiness in the family, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Flying for a married woman symbolizes achieving what she wants and a happy beginning for her in life. The meaning of flying is that a woman A married woman moving from house to house indicates marriage to another man or divorce between spouses, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing the wings of the Virgin Mary in a dream by Al-Osaimi When you see wings in a dream of the Virgin Mary, it has many signs, the most important of which are the following: Seeing this dream for single people indicates making a decision. And thinking and taking responsibility. As for clients who see white feathers in a dream, it is a sign of joy, success, and happiness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But when a girl sees wings in the sky, this is a sign of overcoming difficulties and the desire for freedom, and God knows best. Read also: Visions

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a chair in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a chair in a dream for single and married women. There are many dreams that many people care about, while seeing a chair in a dream varies according to the person’s social status. Also, seeing a chair indicates the goodness and high status of whoever sees it, and seeing a white chair indicates a person’s ability to solve his problems, and here is the most important thing. It came from interpretations about the interpretation of a dream about seeing a chair in a dream for unmarried women.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a chair in a dream for a pregnant woman. There are many interpretations of dreams through which the viewer seeks to know the meaning behind the dream. The chair also indicates a high status for the dreamer in his professional life, while it varies. A pregnant woman’s chair in its interpretations for a married woman. Here are the most important interpretations of it. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a chair in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a chair in a dream indicates ease and ease of childbirth. Also, seeing a chair in a dream indicates the birth of a boy. While seeing a chair in a dream for a married man, it shows his love. For his wife and her place with him. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a person tied with a rope in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about arranged chairs for a married woman? There are many interpretations of dreams that differ from one person to another, while a married woman’s vision of padded chairs carries with it many associations, and scholars have agreed However, seeing a chair indicates a high position, and a white chair indicates the ability to solve it. The problems he faces in his daily life, and the following are the most important interpretations of what the dream of elegant chairs is for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is sitting on a chair, this indicates her happy life with her husband. Also, if a woman sees that she is buying chairs of high value for their price This indicates that she will get a job. When a married woman sees upholstered chairs in her dream, this indicates her social status among her family members. See also: Interpretation of seeing wearing short clothes in a dream. I see myself carrying a chair in a dream. Scientists have agreed that seeing a chair means goodness and status. And seeing a chair in a dream indicates the sustenance and goodness that the dreamer will enjoy in his coming days, while an expensive chair indicates the dreamer’s condition in his family. . Here are the most important interpretations about it: Seeing yourself carrying a chair in a dream: To see herself sitting in a wheelchair and someone carrying her in a dream means that this girl will achieve her goals. Also, seeing an unmarried woman sitting in a chair and carrying in a dream indicates the status that the dreamer enjoys. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bottle of water in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a chair in a dream for a married woman. Social status plays a big role in a fortuneteller’s dream, and a chair in a dream for a married woman shows the fortuneteller’s high status for her husband, the happiness that prevails together, and stability in marital life, and there are many Of interpretations, including dreams. Interpreters interpret the dream of seeing a chair in a dream for a married woman: If the woman sees

title: Interpretation of seeing vitiligo in a dream, interpretation by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the appearance of vitiligo in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Vitiligo is a skin disease that affects the body as a result of the loss of part of the pigment cells, and there is often no treatment for this disease. A disturbing vision, but its interpretation is positive, indicating that the dreamer's life has changed for the better and that he will receive a lot of nourishment. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing vitiligo in a dream, and the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams of seeing vitiligo in a dream, interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin realized that if the sleeper sees in his dream that vitiligo has affected areas of his body, this is evidence that great sustenance has arrived for him. And this sustenance may be an inheritance. Vitiligo in a dream is an indication of positive events that will occur in the dreamer’s life. Seeing vitiligo in a dream is a sign of the goodness that the dreamer will obtain. Interpretation of a dream about seeing vitiligo in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the appearance of spots White from vitiligo on her body, this is a sign of positive things and praiseworthy events that await her. Seeing vitiligo in a single girl’s dream on her face, this is a sign that many problems and fears will enter her life. The presence of vitiligo spots on the waist of an unmarried girl in her dream is considered good news for her marriage. Early. If an unmarried girl sees spots of vitiligo in her dream and is in a state of happiness, this is evidence of sustenance and kindness arriving to her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing vitiligo in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees signs of vitiligo on her hand in her dream, this is a good omen awaiting her with great power. If a married woman sees that vitiligo is spreading throughout her body in a dream, this is a sign that there are some disputes between her and her husband. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is afflicted with vitiligo, this is a sign of good and positive events in his life. When a married woman sees her husband afflicted If a married woman has vitiligo in a dream and feels disgusted by it, this is a sign of bad events that will affect her husband. If a married woman has vitiligo in her leg in a dream, this is a sign that her husband will soon travel to earn money. If a married woman finds in her dream that there are spots of vitiligo on Her children, this is a good sign of praiseworthy events for them. Interpretation of a dream about seeing vitiligo in a dream for a pregnant woman. Vitiligo in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of kindness and happiness. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she has vitiligo, this is a sign that her fetus is male. Seeing vitiligo in a woman’s dream A pregnant woman is a good sign of recovery from the disease. Interpretation of a dream about seeing vitiligo in a dream for a man: If one sees in a dream that a snake struck his hand, this is a sign of earning money, abundance of food, and blessings in it. Seeing vitiligo spread on the neck of the dreamer is a sign of problems and fears that haunt the dreamer In his life. When a young man sees that his body is affected by vitiligo, this is good news that he will soon find a new job and job. Vitiligo in a dream is a sign of a soon marriage in the life of an unmarried young man. Vitiligo has brother connotations.

title: I dreamed that my husband was proposing to someone else, what is the interpretation of the dream?

preview.html: I dreamed that my husband was engaged to another. Engagement is one of the good things that fills the heart and soul with joy and happiness. As for the dreams and engagement of a married man, whether their connotations indicate good or bad, we will explain that through our article that follows the lines, so that the fortuneteller’s heart is reassured and is not distracted by many connotations and interpretations. I dreamed that my husband proposed to another person. Many leading interpretation scholars have confirmed that my husband’s dream of another person in the dreamer’s dream indicates that her husband has all the love and appreciation for her and does many things to please her and make her feel happy. Seeing my husband engaged to another person in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve a lot Of desires and desires that are of great importance to her in the coming periods. A woman’s dream in which her husband proposes to another woman while she is sleeping is a sign of her great success in her personal and family life and that she provides all assistance to her husband and children and does not delay in any of her duties. As many scholars have said Commentators say that seeing my husband proposing to someone else in a dream means that he is living a married life without problems and pressures. I dreamed that my husband proposed marriage to another person according to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing my husband proposing to someone else in a dream is an indication of positive changes that will occur in The life of the dreamer will change it for the better in the coming days, which heralds the arrival of goodness and livelihood that will fill her life. The great scholar Ibn Sirin also confirmed that seeing my husband carrying others in a woman’s dream means that she has heard a lot of good news that will greatly put her in a state of psychological comfort. In the coming days. Seeing my husband engaged to another in the dreamer’s sleep means that she needs to renew her relationship with her husband so that she can break the routine and always have love between them. The Asrar website for interpreting dreams is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write. A site about secrets of interpretation Dreams: Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. I dreamed that my husband proposed to someone else. If a married woman sees that her husband is engaged to another woman in a dream, this is a sign of many blessings and good things that will completely fill her life and her family and no longer make them always think about improving their financial situation. . Situation. Seeing my husband engaged to another person in a woman’s dream indicates that her husband will receive a major promotion in his field of work. He has put a lot of effort into reaching it and it will completely change their lives. Whereas if a married woman sees that her husband is engaged to another and has a lot of Guests and music while she is sleeping, this shows the many differences and big problems between her and her partner that are difficult for her to confront and solve. It will lead to the complete end of their relationship. However, if the dreamer sees her husband proposing to another woman and sitting next to a woman in her dream, this indicates that her husband is always forcing her to do things that she does not want. I dreamed that my husband was proposing to another pregnant woman. Many senior interpretation scholars have confirmed that seeing my husband He is engaged to another F

title: Interpretation of a dream about electricity in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dream about electricity in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Nabulsi. We present to you on the Moments website everything that is new and distinctive in this article on our website, dreams and interpretation of dreams, and how to interpret dreams and interpret the meaning of electricity in a dream. The meaning of a dream about electricity by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Learn more about Mohazat. You can see: Seeing Surah Quraish in a dream Interpretation of electricity in a dream Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in his dream that he has been electrocuted. This indicates that this person will be affected by anxiety, sadness, and problems, and this vision may indicate that. This also means that a person will suffer from a serious illness, but if one sees in a dream that a group of people will be exposed to electricity. This indicates that they will suffer from many problems and trials. If one sees in a dream that electrical wires are bare and have a high current charge. This It indicates that this person is surrounded by a group of corrupt people who are waiting for the person who had the vision to inflict evil on him and many problems. But if he sees that electricity collides with a house and there is a sick person, then this vision shows the death of that person. Seeing electricity for Nabulsi Imam Nabulsi says that if a person sees in a dream that He shocks people with electricity, this indicates that this person is unjust. But if he sees that the ruler is electrocuting him, this indicates that this person will suffer from great injustice from the ruler. If someone sees in a dream that he is relieving someone from electricity, this indicates that this The person will get rid of all the problems and worries that surround him. This vision also shows that the dreamer is a strong person who can face problems and obstacles in his life. Dreaming of free electricity. Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees that electricity is hitting her house, this means that many problems will arise in The house. This vision also shows the spread of diseases in the house, but if it is seen that it absorbs electricity. This vision shows that this girl is hasty in making decisions and many problems will occur to her as a result of these decisions, so she must be careful. A vision of strength for a married woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that Seeing electricity in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of many marital problems in her home. Whether she sees her husband torturing her with electricity, this vision indicates divorce and separation. If she sees the light after dark, this indicates that she will get rid of the problems she suffers from and begin a new life in her home. Electricity cables in a dream. If one sees in a dream that the electrical wires are bare and have a high current charge. This indicates that this person is surrounded by a number of corrupt people who are lurking around the insightful person. To afflict him with evil and many problems. But if he sees that electricity is affecting one of the houses and he If there is a sick person, then this vision indicates the death of that person. Dreaming of an electrician on the ground. Seeing in a dream that electricity strikes the ground indicates the extent of injustice. Interpretation of saving a person from electricity. Seeing the dreamer that he is saving a specific person from an electric shock.

title: Interpretation of seeing a newborn boy or girl in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a newborn baby girl or a little girl in a dream in detail, as the meanings of seeing a little girl in a dream vary depending on the condition of the dreamer. It can indicate a lot of kindness and fulfillment of desires, if the girl is also beautiful. As for the rest, they are by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Ibn Shaheen. What is the interpretation of seeing a baby girl being born in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing a little girl in a dream indicates good luck and good news. title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking for a sacrifice in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans The interpretation of the deceased asking for a sacrifice in a dream. It is one of the good dreams that tell us the end of worries and matters of comfort. Other interpretations vary according to the condition of the dreamer and according to the vision of its owner. deceased. And the type of this sacrifice, and in our next article we will present in detail what was said about Ibn Sirin in interpreting this dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dead person asking for a sacrifice in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a skeleton in a dream symbolizes good events that the dreamer will enjoy, such as removing worries and overcoming adversity. And tribulations. When she sees this pregnant woman under the protection of God Almighty, he cuts her throat for her. It is good news that her childbearing season will pass at the best time, and that she will soon give birth to a good child, God willing. A man’s vision of the deceased asking for a sacrifice and slaughtering a cow indicates that the fortuneteller will help him in matters of marriage and that his marriage will take place soon, God willing. As for the vision? The dead man killing a camel, it indicates On what should happen with the death of a member of the dreamer’s family for any reason, and God knows best. To dream of a dead person slaughtering a sheep. To dream of a dead person slaughtering a sheep is considered one of the visions that convey many messages to its owner, including the dreamer’s call to do good, to give zakat for the sake of God, and to have mercy on the poor and needy. And helping the weak. It also indicates that the deceased died and owed debts, or that he had money for certain people and died before that money could be implemented, so it is a message to the pioneer to pay those debts on behalf of the deceased and return the deposit. for them. Friends, and God knows best. It is also stated in the interpretation of Ibn Sirin that seeing the dead in a dream. A sheep is sacrificed as a sign of the recovery of those suffering from an illness in the dreamer’s family, God willing. It is also interpreted as a harbinger of the cessation of anxiety, the alleviation of anxiety, the removal of obstacles, the achievement of what is desired, and the expectation of relief from anxiety. It is also A clear message to the dreamer that if he fails to worship his Lord, he must repent and return to God and do what brings him closer to God Almighty. Asking a dead person to slaughter a sheep in a dream. Seeing dead people asking the dreamer to slaughter a sheep. This clearly indicates in the dream that the dreamer is among the people who do not worship the Lord of the Worlds. And that requesting slaughter is a desire to do good and abandon disobedience and disobedience. If you see a dead person in a dream asking one of his relatives to slaughter a sheep, this is a sign of the dead person’s need to pray for him, give alms for his soul and feed the poor and needy, because they spend. The dead. And atonement for their sins. The dreamer watches in his dream the dead asking for a sheep. Its revelation is good news for the dreamer to relieve anxiety, remove worries, facilitate matters, and heal the sick quickly, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for meat. For a person to see in a dream that one of his relatives asks for meat in a dream, it is an indication of urging children to do good and get closer to God. God Almighty urged them to communicate and cooperate among themselves and to preserve their kinship. As for a married woman, when she sees the deceased asking her for chicken meat in her dream, this indicates that she will receive good things, an abundance of food, and joy and pleasure in her life.

title: How do I know who fascinated me? How do I know who fascinated me?

preview.html: We have many questions: How do you know where the magic is, how do I know the magician or sorcerer who worked with me, and some of them ask for a prayer to reveal the person who did the magic in the Qur’an, and we will talk about answering and canceling magic and removing the taint from drinking and eating. How do you know what your magic is? First: You must stay away from taboos. , that is, escaping by listening to songs, leaving bad companions, and doing many good deeds such as giving alms and reading the Qur’an. You pray Tahajjud at the time of response, which I used to pray, an hour before the call, and the supplication with which I prayed, O Lord, I see who bewitched me in a dream. Ask for forgiveness 100 Once after each prayer, a total of 500 times. In communication with God, I asked for help and supplication at any time, especially in the last third of the night. I washed myself and went to the Lord of the slaves and repeated: “O Lord, I left the slaves and came to you. O Lord, I am sad. I am patient. Have mercy on my condition and help me against the oppressors. And in every situation.” Sometimes I rely on the oppressors, meaning God is sufficient for me, and He is the best of those who can be trusted with the magician and his helpers against those who bewitch me, envy me, and hurt me. If possible, publish it, compose it, and make it a hymn, and ask those who are with you in the place to say it with you. We also pray to God to grant you a good vision to show you the person who bewitched you, and I intend for it to be the reason. Praying that he recognizes them so that they do not harm them. One of the sisters tried it and said: Praise be to God who responds to the oppressed when he calls upon him. By God, then by God, even my family appears to them in the visions of the woman who bewitched me. It is not just me, and I always see her saying it in the clip. I seek refuge from her. Evil, this seeks to spoil your engagement, fear its evil. There is hope and optimism. How do you know your type of magic? It basically determines the type of magic from dreams, and it is also possible to know the type of jinn. Dreaming of large and small snakes indicates the presence of a clock and a guard in magic. Decipher the clock. Repeat one of the verses. And from the evil of darkness if it remains for a long time without... Stop until the guard is burned. Also, we need to know where the magic is, because the guardian and the magic will return as soon as they pass over the water sprinkled with magic, and they are often at the doorsteps of the houses. And here, if we know where the spraying is, we will reach Barki who reads in the house for more than two hours until the house guard is killed and the demons are chased away. The one responsible for renewing the magic. The larger the snake, the stronger the guard, and the smaller it is, the weaker it is with the Qur’an and Ruqyah. Treatment must continue without interruption even after recovery by drinking Zamzam water over it, memorizing the morning and evening remembrances without interruption, and praying the five prayers on time. It is best to concentrate. Speaking of the guardian of magic, because most people suffer from the return of magic with a short recovery period and the reason mentioned. Also, seeing a snake in a dream indicates the people of the jinn and their presence. It is a jinn in cemeteries and its religion differs according to its type. As for the large snake, it shows a high degree, and as for the flying snake, it is a worker. A bath and the magic or touch appears when reading to the patient. The type of magic is known as what happens to the afflicted person while awake and the magic that turns into love is known from its location in the body and the location of the pain, because everything that moves the place of pain in the

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cabbage in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about seeing cabbage in a dream and seeing cabbage in a dream indicates something that you want to achieve and it may be difficult to achieve because it indicates recovery from diseases, and cabbage or cabbage is one of the types of vegetables and it can have wonderful health benefits and is characterized by a sweet and delicious taste, and it is considered one of the types of vegetables. Famous Egyptian dishes, and it has great health benefits. It is necessary to cook cabbage in winter especially, especially as it gives the body energy and vitality. Follow us to learn the interpretation of a dream about seeing cabbage in a dream. A dream about seeing cabbage by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees himself carrying cabbage seeds, this It indicates that he wants to achieve something that is difficult to achieve, and it also says that whoever sees himself planting cabbage seeds in his house, this indicates his recovery. There is a patient in this house. Cabbage is a medicine and is said to be a sterilizer. If he sees that he is eating cabbage, this indicates his recovery and having children. Cabbage in a dream is usually a sign of a heavy heart and brutality. Cabbage, in a dream, indicates saved money and great wealth. Also, seeing cabbage, as some scholars interpret it, is evidence of piety and repentance. Dreaming of seeing cabbage for a single woman. Seeing cabbage in a dream in a dream for an unmarried woman, this indicates that a cruel brother-in-law will approach her. Cabbage also shows a strong temperament and can symbolize a single woman as a woman who does not want to reveal her secrets and personal matters, and prefers to stay away from others. And she tends to feel lonely. Seeing buying cabbage in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she has social intelligence, in addition to many relationships and a correct vision for many things. Seeing cooking and eating cabbage in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions that indicate praise and good news for her. Also, seeing cabbage in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions that indicate praise and good news for her. Cabbage growing in a dream means good news for her and her short marriage. Dreaming of seeing cabbage for a married woman. Seeing cabbage for a married woman in a dream indicates kindness and decent living, but after adversity and fatigue. Dream interpretation of seeing cabbage in a married woman’s dream also symbolizes a stubborn husband. Seeing cabbage Growing in a married woman’s dream means that you will get pregnant soon. Cabbage or cabbage seeds for a married woman in a dream indicate goodness and decent living, but after hardships and fatigue. Seeing cabbage growing in a married woman’s dream indicates a sign of pregnancy soon. A pregnant woman dreams of seeing cabbage. Interpretation of a dream about cabbage indicates For a pregnant woman in a dream, it indicates that she will get rid of pregnancy problems. She will give birth to a boy who is persistent but will be easy to give birth. A dream to see cabbage for a man. A man who sees cabbage in his dream indicates that he will earn an abundant living. Fresh green cabbage in a dream shows grace and kindness. Eating cabbage in A dream about a man is also a welcome vision and great goodness in the dreamer’s life. Seeing cabbage seeds in a dream indicates many benefits for the pioneer. Whoever sees that he is cooking cabbage, and there is a sick person, this indicates the recovery of the sick person. Seeing green cabbage indicates good luck
preview.text: The interpretation of a dream about seeing cabbage in a dream and seeing cabbage in a dream indicates something you want to achieve and it may be difficult to achieve because it indicates recovery from diseases, and cabbage or cabbage is one of the types of vegetables and can have wonderful health benefits and is characterized by a sweet and delicious taste, and it is considered one of the famous Egyptian dishes, and it has great health benefits, it is necessary to cook cabbage in winter especially, especially since it gives energy to the body and vitality, follow us to learn about the interpretation of a dream about seeing cabbage in a dream. A dream about seeing cabbage for Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees himself carrying cabbage seeds, this indicates that he wants to achieve something that is difficult to achieve, and he also says that whoever sees himself planting cabbage seeds in his house, this indicates his recovery. A patient in this house. Cabbage is a medicine and it is said to be sterile. If he sees that he is eating cabbage, this indicates his recovery and having children. Cabbage in a dream is usually a sign of a thick heart and brutality. Cabbage, in a dream, indicates saved money and great wealth. Seeing cabbage, as interpreted by some scholars, is also evidence of piety and repentance. Dreaming of seeing cabbage for a single woman Seeing cabbage in a dream in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that a harsh son-in-law will approach her. Cabbage also shows a strong mood and can symbolize a single woman as a woman who does not want to reveal her secrets and personal matters, prefers to stay away from others and tends to feel lonely. Seeing buying cabbage in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she has social intelligence, in addition to many relationships and the correct vision of many things. Seeing cooking and eating cabbage in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions that indicate praise and good news for her. Seeing cabbage growing in a dream also means good news for her and her short marriage. Dreaming of seeing cabbage for a married woman Seeing cabbage for a married woman in a dream indicates kindness and a decent life, but after Adversity and fatigue. Interpretation of dreams to see cabbage in a married woman's dream also symbolizes a stubborn husband. Seeing cabbage growing in a married woman's dream means that you will soon become pregnant. Cabbage seeds or cabbage for a married woman in a dream indicate goodness and a decent living, but after hardships and fatigue. Seeing cabbage growing in a married woman's dream indicates a sign of pregnancy soon. Dreaming of seeing pregnant cabbage The interpretation of a dream about cabbage for a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that she will get rid of pregnancy problems. And give birth to a persistent boy, but it will be easy to give birth. A dream to see cabbage for a man A man who sees cabbage in his dream indicates that he will earn a living in abundance. Fresh green cabbage in a dream shows grace and kindness. Eating cabbage in a man's dream is also a welcome vision and great good in the dreamer's life. Seeing cabbage seeds in a dream indicates many benefits for the visionary. Whoever sees that he is cooking cabbage, and there is a patient, this indicates the recovery of the patient. Seeing green cabbage indicates luck
